statements: SELECT * FROM ManufacturingFacilities;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM ManufacturingFacilities;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM ManufacturingFacilities WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingFacilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM ManufacturingFacilities WHERE inspection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingFacilities WHERE facility_id = 3;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM ManufacturingFacilities WHERE inspection_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingFacilities WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT facility_name, location, inspection_date FROM ManufacturingFacilities WHERE location IN ('Chicago', 'New York') ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(*) AS total_facilities FROM ManufacturingFacilities GROUP BY facility_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_facilities DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM manufacturing_facilities WHERE inspection_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT facility_name, inspector_name FROM manufacturing_facilities JOIN inspection_reports ON manufacturing_facilities.facility_id = inspection_reports.facility_id;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, inspection_date FROM manufacturing_facilities WHERE location = 'XYZ';
SELECT report_id, inspector_name, report_date FROM inspection_reports WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location, inspection_date FROM manufacturing_facilities ORDER BY facility_name ASC
SELECT * FROM inspection_reports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE AND report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT facility_name, location FROM manufacturing_facilities WHERE facility_id = '3e521846-a5a5-43e9-9e88-23c5b3d2e6a9'

SELECT facility_id, facility_name, inspector_name, report_date FROM manufacturing_facilities INNER JOIN inspection_reports ON manufacturing_facilities.facility_id = inspection_reports.facility_id AND compliance_status = FALSE
SELECT facility_name, location FROM manufacturing_facilities WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY location, facility_name ASC
SELECT * FROM PharmaceuticalInspectors;
SELECT hospital_name, inspector_name FROM PharmaceuticalInspectors WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM ManufacturingFacilities WHERE inspection_status = True;
SELECT report_id, inspection_date, compliance_score FROM ComplianceReports ORDER BY compliance_score DESC;
SELECT hospital_name, COUNT(*) AS num_inspectors FROM PharmaceuticalInspectors GROUP BY hospital_name;
SELECT * FROM PharmaceuticalInspectors;
SELECT inspector_name, hospital_name FROM PharmaceuticalInspectors ORDER BY inspector_name DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location, inspection_status FROM ManufacturingFacilities WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT report_id, compliance_score FROM ComplianceReports WHERE compliance_score > 80 ORDER BY compliance_score DESC;
SELECT r.report_id, f.facility_name, r.inspection_date FROM ComplianceReports r JOIN ManufacturingFacilities f ON r.facility_id = f.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingFacilities
SELECT facility_name, location FROM ManufacturingFacilities
SELECT inspection_date, facility_name FROM ManufacturingFacilities ORDER BY inspection_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Inspections WHERE result = 'Fail'
SELECT facility_name, inspection_date FROM Inspections JOIN ManufacturingFacilities ON Inspections.facility_id = ManufacturingFacilities.facility_id
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingFacilities WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM ManufacturingFacilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;

SELECT Inspections.inspection_id, Inspections.result, ManufacturingFacilities.facility_name FROM Inspections INNER JOIN ManufacturingFacilities ON Inspections.facility_id = ManufacturingFacilities.facility_id WHERE Inspection.result = 'Failed';

SELECT Inspectors.inspector_name, COUNT(Inspections.inspection_id) AS total_inspections FROM Inspectors LEFT JOIN Inspections ON Inspectors.inspector_id = Inspections.inspector_id GROUP BY Inspectors.inspector_name;

SELECT Violations.violation_id, Violations.violation_description, ManufacturingFacilities.facility_name FROM Violations INNER JOIN Inspections ON Violations.inspection_id = Inspections.inspection_id INNER JOIN ManufacturingFacilities ON Inspections.facility_id = ManufacturingFacilities.facility_id ORDER BY Violations.violation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingFacilities
SELECT facility_name, location FROM ManufacturingFacilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC
SELECT facility_name, location, inspection_date FROM ManufacturingFacilities WHERE location='New York'
SELECT inspector_name, contact_number FROM Inspectors WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT violation_description, penalty_amount FROM Violations ORDER BY penalty_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingFacilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM ManufacturingFacilities WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT inspector_name, certification_date FROM Inspectors WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT facility_name, inspection_date, compliance_status FROM ManufacturingFacilities JOIN Inspections ON ManufacturingFacilities.facility_id = Inspections.facility_id;

SELECT facility_name, violation_description, penalty_amount FROM ManufacturingFacilities JOIN Inspections ON ManufacturingFacilities.facility_id = Inspections.facility_id JOIN Violations ON Inspections.inspection_id = Violations.inspection_id WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-compliant';
